definition: cover of lamp/lampshade/glass cover of oil lamp

sentences.english: The ceiling light is now covered with a white globe.
sentences.chinese: 現在那盞吊燈上裝了一個球形燈罩。

sentences.english: It was lit by hooded fluorescent lamps.
sentences.chinese: 照明用的是帶燈罩的日光燈。

sentences.english: He set straight the fluffy shade on the unlighted lamp.
sentences.chinese: 他全神貫注地整理那盞沒有點亮的燈上的絨毛燈罩。

sentences.english: Lampshade and bulb made of the same flexible material.
sentences.chinese: 燈罩和燈泡用同一種軟性材料製作。

sentences.english: Physical testing and chemical analysis and electropolishing test were made to study the reasons of occurring of surface veins.
sentences.chinese: 對燈罩表面水紋狀進行了理化檢驗和電解拋光試驗。

sentences.english: Sales person: Here it is. I also brought a cream color lampshade to show you.
sentences.chinese: 這就是了，我也拿了個奶黃色的燈罩給你看。

sentences.english: I looked at the ribbon pinned to my lampshade and suddenly felt ashamed.
sentences.chinese: 我看着別在燈罩上的藍飄帶，頓時感到羞愧。

sentences.english: The tiltable headlamp cover assembly is convenient for routine maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 可翻式大燈罩總成設計，方便日常維護。

sentences.english: A gas-jet without a globe lit up the place.
sentences.chinese: 一盞沒燈罩的煤氣燈照亮了這間房間。

sentences.english: It can also change the shape of its lampshade automatically.
sentences.chinese: 它也能自動地改變燈罩形狀。

sentences.english: With this process the mould of car lampshade was manufactured.
sentences.chinese: 利用該工藝製造了汽車塑料燈罩的模具。

sentences.english: David's headlights were fitted with blackout masks, but he drove very fast just the same.
sentences.chinese: 雖然前燈上裝着閉燈罩，大衛仍驅車如飛。

sentences.english: She turned the wick down, lifted off the globe, and breathed onthe sulky flame.
sentences.chinese: 她把燈芯捻低，取下燈罩，對着發蔫的火頭哈了口氣。

sentences.english: Her instinct tells her that the darkest spot is directly on the other side of a lamp shade.
sentences.chinese: 直覺告訴葡萄，光線最暗的一塊在燈罩的另一面。

sentences.english: Luminaire so constructed that a specified vapor or gas cannot enter enclosure.
sentences.chinese: 可防止一特定蒸汽或氣體進入燈罩的燈具。

sentences.english: the invader saw the shadow of the lampshade fade away.
sentences.chinese: 入侵者看見這個燈罩的陰影逐漸消掉。

definition: ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
